again," said he, emitting the words separately through his thin compressed lips, "I willthrowhim down there. Now then!" 
Saying this he again turned round, dropped his hands, took the bottle and lifted it to his lips, threw back his head, and raised his free hand to balance himself. One of the footmen who had stooped to pick up some broken glass remained in that position without taking his eyes from the window and from D61okhov's back. Anatole stood erect with staring eyes.
